page.title: 16Leven Scouts at Camp.
page.content: On a Friday evening in early May,1st Leven Scouts set off for 'Durie Estate' north of the town ,for a weekend camp. On arriving at the site we put up all the tents;there was a tent,a cooking shelter and a hike tent for each patrol. On Saturday we had to get up early to cook our own breakfast of bacon and eggs.After breakfast we made useful camp gadgets and after that we prepared and ate dinner.Later, we went on a nature walk to Silverburn and spent an hour there.In the evening our parents came to visit the camp. We only stayed half the day on Sunday. We took all of the equipment down, then we packed all of our personal kit and walked home.{
